Package uniandes.lym.robot.kernel

Class RobotWorldDec

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.lym.robot.kernel.RobotWorld
      • uniandes.lym.robot.kernel.RobotWorldDec
  • public class RobotWorldDec
extends RobotWorld
    Decorates world with more complex instructions Adds error management. Adds a function that allows negative arguments horizontally or vertically.

      • freeSpacesForChips

        public int freeSpacesForChips()
        Returns:
        spaces available to put chips.

      • chipsToPick

        public int chipsToPick()
        Returns:
        number of chips on or above the current position.

      • moveHorizontally

        public void moveHorizontally​(int steps,
                             boolean jump)
                      throws java.lang.Error
        Used to move the robot horizontally on the board
        Parameters:
        steps - to move (if steps > 0 it moves to the right; if steps < 0 it moves to the left.
        jump - true if it can jump over obstacles; false if path must be clear
        Throws:
        java.lang.Error - if the robot ends up outside the board

      • moveVertically

        public void moveVertically​(int steps,
                           boolean jump)
                    throws java.lang.Error
        Used to move the robot vertically on the board
        Parameters:
        steps - to move (if steps > 0 it moves down; if steps < 0 it moves up.
        jump - true if it can jump over obstacles; false if path must be clear
        Throws:
        java.lang.Error - if the robot ends up outside the board

      • pickChips

        public void pickChips​(int f)
               throws java.lang.Error
        Pick up chips
        Parameters:
        f - chips to pick up
        Throws:
        java.lang.Error - if there are less than f chips.

      • putChips

        public void putChips​(int f)
              throws java.lang.Error
        Method used for putting chips
        Parameters:
        f - number of chips to put
        Throws:
        java.lang.Error - if: f is negative, there is not enough room for the chips or if the robot does not have enough chips

      • grabBalloons

        public void grabBalloons​(int g)
                  throws java.lang.Error
        Method used for grabbing balloons that are on the same position as the robot.
        Parameters:
        g - Number of balloons to grab
        Throws:
        java.lang.Error - if g is negative or if there are not enough balloons

      • popBalloons

        public void popBalloons​(int g)

        Parameters:
        g - Number of balloons to grab

        Parameters:
        g - Number of balloons to put
        Throws:

      • moveForward

        public void moveForward​(int pasos,
                        boolean jump)
                 throws java.lang.Error
        Used to move the robot forward
        Parameters:
        steps - number of steps to move in the direction it is facing.
        jump - true if it can jump over obstacles; false if path must be clear
        Throws:
        java.lang.Error - if the robot ends up outside the board; it lands on an obstacle or if there are obstacles in its path when not jumping
